sentences.english: Sometimes, humans can be more anxious than those gerbils.
sentences.chinese: 有些时候，人的焦虑情绪比沙鼠还严重。

sentences.english: The physiological function of the sterilant was also tested.
sentences.chinese: 本试验还对该药对长爪沙鼠的生理作用作了测试。

sentences.english: People are sometimes more anxious than gerbils.
sentences.chinese: 有些时候，人的焦虑情绪比沙鼠还严重。

sentences.english: The hind legs of the gerbil are particularly well adapted to leaping across its desert habitat.
sentences.chinese: 沙鼠的后腿尤其适应于在沙漠栖息地跳跃。

sentences.english: My name is Gary. I am a gerbil, I live in Mongolian steppe.
sentences.chinese: 我叫盖瑞，我是只沙鼠，住在蒙古草原上。

sentences.english: Guinea pigs take only two months after mating to bear babies, and gerbils only 25 days.
sentences.chinese: 豚鼠交配后两个月便能生崽子，但是沙鼠只需25天。

sentences.english: They fumigated infected burrows with insecticide, killing the fleas but sparing the gerbils.
sentences.chinese: 他们将杀虫剂喷入沙鼠的洞穴，只杀死跳蚤。

sentences.english: And he had turned the Prime Minister's teacup into a gerbil.
sentences.chinese: 接着他把首相的茶杯变成了一只沙鼠。

sentences.english: Objective To establish a rapid hyperlipidemic gerbil model.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立长爪沙鼠速发型高脂血症模型的方法。

sentences.english: Distribution of glires in arid regions of China .
The kittens only respond when the gerbil makes a break for it.
sentences.chinese: 小猫只会在沙鼠逃走时做出反应。

definition: vulture/(bird species of China) griffon vulture (Gyps fulvus)
to prey on/to catch and feed on/to hunt for food
